News.Title: Future Enterprises Sets Record Date for INR 508 Crore Interim Distribution to Debenture Holders
News.Summary: Future Enterprises Limited, undergoing Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process since February 27, 2023, has set August 1, 2025 as the record date for interim distribution to debenture holders. The distribution involves INR 508 crores generated from asset sales under Resolution Professional Avil Menezes. The National Company Law Tribunal approved the interim distribution on May 2, 2025, following Committee of Creditors' approval. The distribution covers Non-Convertible Debentures across Series XV, XVII, XVIII, and XX, with Axis Trustee Services Limited serving as debenture trustee. The distribution is interim in nature and subject to mandatory priority payments under Section 53 of the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code, with potential reversals if excess amounts are distributed.
